name: caffe d'bolla Gift Card $25, $50, $100
description:
Put the Jingle in your Kringle.

Give a loved one, a friend, or just yourself the galactically popular "caffe d'bolla" gift card.

Includes FREE First Class Shipping!

name: Tokio Coffee Syphon TCA-3
description:
This 3 cup siphon is the same brewer we use daily in our caffe. It has proven to be sturdy and easy to care for - even after months of (loving) abuse. The glass is specially made in Japan, so it can withstand the rapid heating and cooling of siphon brewing. This coffee siphon is a great addition for any coffee enthusiast!
caffe d'bolla is the exclusive importer for the Tokio Coffee Syphon.



If you have not tasted coffee from a siphon brewer before, you are in for a real treat! The siphon brewer creates an exceptionally clean and dynamic cup, and you will feel like a mad coffee scientist as you concoct your precious brew.

*Grind your coffee a bit finer than drip.
*Add near boiling water to the bulb on your coffee siphon.
*Raise the flame on the burner until the water is boiling.
*Add fresh ground coffee to upper chamber.
*Vapor pressure will force the water into the upper chamber.
* Lower the flame, and give a quick stir to saturate your coffee grounds.
*Allow coffee to brew 35 to 60 seconds -- time will vary with coffee and your taste.
*Extinguish the flame and watch your precious brew flow to the bulb on the bottom.
*Remove the top chamber from your siphon brewer and rest it inside the lid.
*Pour...
*Now enjoy your coffee!


Your Tokio Siphon Coffee Brewer includes

* 1 3 cup Tokio Siphon Coffee Brewer
* 1 alcohol burner
* 1 measuring scoop and stir stick
* manual

name: Select Single Origin Subscription
description: You can have some of the world's best Single Origin coffees, fresh roasted and delivered to your door every month! We roast all of our coffees on site in small batches to ensure freshness. We will select one of our favorite seasonal Single Origin coffees, and roast it just for you! You can schedule your fresh roasted Select Single Origin Coffees to be delivered either once or twice a month for three, six, or twelve months. Coffees will be shipped on the first Tuesday of the month for 1/month, and on the first and third Tuesdays for 2/month. The Select Single Origin Subscription can also be the perfect gift for a fellow coffee lover, friend, or your favorite relative. Delivery within United States only. 312g whole bean. Shipping is included in the price of your subscription.

name: Akira BH-100 Halogen Beam Heater
description:
This is the Akira Beam Heater for Siphon Coffee. We have been working with the manufacturer for over three years, and we are excited to offer this to you.

This is the Beam Heater used by barista for regional Siphon competitions throughout Asia.

350W 110V/60HZ - No step down transformer needed!

Larger base with wider cooling fins improves air flow to keep internal components cooler during operation.

Two (2) halogen bulbs (1 plus replacement) are included.

caffe d'bolla is the only authorized distributor outside of Asia.

<small>Shipping within lower 48 is standard ground.
Allow 5-7 business days for delivery.
AK and HI residents please email for rates.

International shipments will be shipped Priority.</small>

name: Akira 450 ml Stainless Steel Pour Over Kettle
description:
This 450 ml kettle is the perfect size for 1-2 cup brewing. The polished stainless exterior will readily reflect your happy face as you make your coffee. 

Precision spout for easy and controlled pouring. 

Can be used on electric, gas, radiant, and induction heating surfaces. 



For shipping outside of the contiguous 48, please email for rates.

name: Hario V60 01 Ceramic Dripper Cone
description:
This is the 01 size of the V60 Cone. We carry white ceramic.
It makes 7 to 10 ounces of coffee. Perfect for a single cup brew.

These use the VCF-01 filters, which are available in our online store as well.

To complete your brewing set-up you can add the 360 Clear Range Server - specifically made for the 01 size Dripper.

Need a Buono Kettle?  Get it here!

Happy Brewing!

name: Coffee Tasting Basic: Thursday February 28, 7:00 pm
description:
In this class you will learn the fundamental elements that contribute to the unique taste and aromatics of coffee. 

The importance of roasting and fresh grinding will be illustrated both in concept
and practice.

Your senses will be attacked with coffee from a high volume chain, and then you will be enlightened by the regional differences between two phenomenal micro-roasted coffees.

Coffees will change with each class.

Educate. Your. Palate.

<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="220" height="165" data="http://www.flickr.com/apps/video/stewart.swf?v=109786" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"> <param name="flashvars" value="intl_lang=en-us&photo_secret=9d1ddd914c&photo_id=6842822449"></param> <param name="movie" value="http://www.flickr.com/apps/video/stewart.swf?v=109786"></param> <param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"></param> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.flickr.com/apps/video/stewart.swf?v=109786" bgcolor="#000000" allowfullscreen="true" flashvars="intl_lang=en-us&photo_secret=9d1ddd914c&photo_id=6842822449" height="165" width="220"></embed></object>

name: Ceramic Conical Burr Coffee Mill
description:
This conical burr coffee mill is ideal for the enthusiast who doesn't have space for a larger grinder or who wants the perfect grinder to travel with. 

The ceramic burrs will last a lifetime of usage and stay cool even with rapid and continuous grinding. Grind adjustment is made through a stepped washer and locking piece on the grinder/handle mechanism. It works great for everything from Turkish to Press. (espresso is doable in a pinch, but it does not have the precision necessary for consistency in espresso)

We work direct with manufacturer, so we do not need to charge the high prices of other retailers.

Priority shipping within US

name: 110V 350W Halogen bulb for Akira BH-100
description: Replacement bulb for the Akira BH-100.

name: Hario V60 Buono Kettle
description:
The Hario Buono Kettle is designed to give you the precision control over the pour you need when using a V60 style dripper. 

Get it! It will make your brewing life easier.

name: Siphon Coffee Brewer Replacement Cloth Filters (5)
description: Five cloth replacement filters for your Siphon Coffee Brewer.

name: Hario 360 Clear Range Server
description:
This clear glass server is designed to work perfectly with the V60-01 Cone. 

The clear glass gives you an unobstructed view of your coffee as you pour. Hario's heat resistant glass is extremely durable and will withstand the rigors of daily brewing for years to come.

name: Hario VCF-01M Filter 40 Pack
description:
This is the filter used for the V60-01 Cone. 

These are the natural filters.

We do not recommend the white filters as they are known to taint the flavors in the coffee.

name: Kona Berry Espresso Cup - 3 oz.
description: This 3 oz. demitasse with kona berry design is one to brighten your day as you sip your favorite espresso.

name: 16 oz. caffe d'bolla travel mug
description:
Be the envy of your friends and co-workers! Display the awesomeness that is your new caffe d'bolla mug while you happily sip your latest brew.

stainless steel inner - hand wash only.

name: Bamboo Stir Stick
description: Bamboo stir stick for your siphon coffee brewing
